text:
Company: Moore and Sons

Job Title: Sales Engineer - Great Lakes Region

About Us:
Moore and Sons is a leading provider of innovative solutions in the manufacturing industry. We are committed to delivering exceptional customer experiences and fostering a culture of mutual respect and professionalism.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated Sales Engineer to join our team in the Great Lakes Region. As a Sales Engineer, you will be responsible for driving sales growth, developing and maintaining customer relationships, and providing technical support to our customers.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute sales strategies to meet sales targets
- Build and maintain strong relationships with customers, identifying opportunities to drive growth
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to provide technical support and solutions to customers
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends, competitor activity, and market developments
- Travel up to 50% of the time to meet with customers and attend industry events

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or related field
- 3+ years of sales engineering experience in the manufacturing industry
- Strong technical knowledge of mechanical systems and manufacturing processes
- Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and bonus structure
- Comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance
- 401(k) matching program
- Ongoing training and professional development opportunities
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
